cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: 10 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Bed in a 10-Bed Community Room -Ideal for solo travelers, features include a shared bathroom, equipped with a light, a shelf, and a locker so you can keep your belongings safe and secure. Towel Service available for an additional cost of 6 AUD per towel.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Double Room with shared bathroom - Similar to a ship or train cabin, this is our most basic sleeping solution. Compact and modest, It's perfect if youâ€™re looking for a place to sleep and a small area to store your belongings. The bathroom is shared.

privates.labelDescription: A classic stay: affordable, comfortable, and private. Our standard option provides two guests with the ideal space to comfortably unwind in total privacy.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 29th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 29th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
